summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3971 for the improvement of the alley in block 30, Boren's Addition, being the alley between 6th Avenue and 5th Avenue, between James Street and Cherry Street; by grading and paving the same; providing for the necessary surface drainage, under Ordinance No. 48357, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
